titles.title: I Bow Before Your Throne, Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I bow before Your throne, Lord,
Worshipping You, worshipping You, worshipping You. (2x)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
No other God above You.
I do adore and love You.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I bow before Your throne, Lord,
Worshipping You, worshipping You, worshipping You.
